Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Exempts the town of Pound Ridge from the establishment of retail dispensary licenses and on-site consumption licenses for cannabis
Summary: Exempts the town of Pound Ridge from the establishment of retail dispensary licenses and on-site consumption licenses for cannabis, provided that the town adopts a local law prohibiting the establishment of such licenses.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, in relation to exempting the town of Pound Ridge from the establishment of retail dispensary licenses and on-site consumption licenses for cannabis
